name: Baba Fumika
intro: Gravure magazines since she was featured there often back in 2015
description: That rack, dude. And her acting ain't half bad considering she isn't that into gravure and is a regular at local TV drama now. Sometimes I'll watch Japanese drama without subtitles because of her. Sometimes. Her introvert personality[3] is also a turn-on for me somehow, once you see how she reacts outside of drama.
comments: [1]She is more commonly referred to as Fumi-chan
[2]She did sing a song before for a producer and it wasn't bad, see {this music video}
[3]As mentioned in her photobook interview, {which I reviewed (and translated)}

name: Tachibana Haru
intro: From mobile game "Alternative Girls" official livestream series "OruKomi"
description: I can't say I want to f**k her, but she'll never hear of that haha. She'll make a good girlfriend though, as conflicting as we may be in personality maybe sorry for insulting your avatar in your livestream!! (>w<) Nowadays she also hosts events for video games and plays some of them herself, apart from occasional cosplays and modelling here and there.
comments: [1]Fans inferred her age from when she graduated from university in 2017, also announced afterwards in her modelpress interviews
[2]I reviewed {her 3rd photobook} and her final for Comiket

name: Hanazawa Kana
intro: From Anime "OreImo" as Kuroneko or earlier in "Kannagi" as Zange-chan
description: Kana-chan has been in so many roles, you're weird if you didn't like her because of one of them. Her outside of Anime is kinda quirky, obsessed with bread[3] more than anyone else, and super lovely. Just count how many roles of cute girls she has voiced and you'll get the gist.
comments: [1]The closest she has come to it was wearing one, specifically just the top with a shirt above, on her 400th episode of her radio program. And maybe when {she showed off her back} on a Tweet a year later
[2]Married to fellow voice actor Oono Kensho, and known to be dating 3 years prior to announcement in July 2020
[3]She is high about bread you thought she is into drugs, as seen on {a Tweet from her radio show}

name: Hikasa Youko
intro: From Anime "K-ON!" as Akiyama Mio, "Seitokai Yakuindomo" as Amakusa Shino, and later in her solo music career
description: I liked her voice a lot thanks to Anime "K-ON!", but also because of that do I get exposed to how sociable and friendly she is, and how her reputation was portrayed by others[3] in front of the camera.
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "Hiyocchi"
[2]Brief solo music career under music label PONY CANYON from 2013 to 2014, releasing 4 singles and 1 album; First single was ending theme for Anime "Attack on Titan"

[3]Ever since her performance in Anime series "WORKING!!" she has been regarded as an "old hag" by fellow voice actor Nakamura Yuuichi as during the recording the director praised on voicing Takanashi Izumi, a lazy and weak woman in her 30s

name: Horie Yui
intro: From Anime "Love Hina" as Narusegawa Naru and "Toradora!" as Kushieda Minori
description: On camera she exudes a very friendly and kind personality (regardless of her current age), and technically her face is still attractive for her age compared to voice actresses around her generation. She has a unique voice which makes her excel in singing and voice acting, being one of the most popular actresses through the 2000s.
comments: [1]As stated by her as a farce of concealing her age so she is always 17, but we know... Okay I'm going to reveal it, you ready? It's 1976.09.20
[2]Have we ever? More like, do we want it now? She did release a ton of photobooks over the years when she was... still... young haha

name: Kayano Ai
intro: Because she's cute? And later from Anime "Hyouka" as Ibara Mayaka and Anime "Servant x Service" as Yamagami Lucy
description: She is one of those few who I followed because she looks cute back in the day, and subsequently I've came to love her soft voice acting and singing. Her hosting that alcohol-drinking YouTube series[3] is just a bonus to see her talk about what she likes.
comments: [1]She released her first original mini-album for her 10th anniversary as a voice actress, under Aniplex
[1]She has released several photobooks without swimsuits, including one for her 10th anniversary as a voice actress
[3]Titled "{Kayanomi}", on YouTube

name: Komatsu Mikako
intro: From Anime "Kamisama Inai no Nichiyoubi" as Princess Ulla Eulesse Hecmatika, and from the Anime's ending theme song
description: She must be the perfect girl next door; From early days posting selfies on Twitter[3] to her music career to her in front of the camera, she has all the talent and appeal. In Anime she performs well too, but we know her real talent is in her singing.
comments: [1]Initially under KING AMUSEMENT CREATIVE (formerly King Records); Now under TOYS' FACTORY produced under composers group Q-MHz
[2]To fellow voice actor Maeno Tomoaki
[3]Here's an example of what she posted on Twitter on {Valentine's Day}

name: Kotobuki Minako
intro: From Anime "K-ON!" as Kotobuki Tsumugi and later in "A-Channel" as Yuuko
description: Having a distinctive lovely voice, she has starred in many roles that will make an impression. Her music career has also been loved by me over the years. Her half-naked in photobooks and having her own YouTube channel[3] is just a bonus.
comments: [1]Under music label and talent agency MusicRay'n; Latest release January 2019

[2]Similar to her fellow group member Tomatsu Haruka, she has released some spectacular shots to bewilder; I have however reviewed {her photobook calendar} of when she was studying in London for a year and a half
[3]Due to her studying overseas in England from April 2020 to December 2021; YouTube videos {where you can see her without makeup} (CANNOT UNSEE WARNING but I like)

name: Ookubo Rumi
intro: Because she's cute, and from Anime "Servant x Service" as Ichimiya Touko
description: With the perfect tsundere[2] voice acting[3] in my opinion and a really adorable face, she is to be loved for everything she has to offer. She remains cute and lively in front of the camera, and that is all I have wanted back in the day.
comments: [1]She has released one photobook so far, cosplaying different roles from her magazine serialization "Illumination Closet"
[2]Hot-cold personality specifically towards love
[3]Characters she voiced that got me were from Anime "Servant x Service" and Anime"Acchi Kocchi" as Miniwa Tsumiki

name: Satou Satomi
intro: From Anime "K-ON!" as Tainaka Ritsu, and later in "Seitokai Yakuindomo" as Shichijou Aria
description: Hyper voice Satomi-chan is the best, whether it is from Anime or from her solo music career. Nobody comes close in this aspect of her and I love her for this. Outside of her work she has a overly kind yet wild personality leaking out of her we might see once in a while.
comments: [1]Commonly referred to as "Shugami" because of her name, amongst other nicknames given
[2]Under music label KING AMUSEMENT CREATIVE (formerly King Records) from 2014 to 2017, releasing 3 singles and 2 albums
[3]Married to fellow voice actor Terashima Takuma

name: Taketatsu Ayana
intro: From Anime "K-ON!" as Nakano Azusa and later in Anime "OreImo" as Kousaka Kirino
description: I wish I could point out more bad stuff about this super popular voice actress[3] but apart from her less than skilled singing (which I beg to differ) everything about her is great, inside and outside of Anime. And she has quite a rack too. You don't need her Anime roles with this real life equivalent.
comments: [1]Technically yes in her 2nd photobook with a thin shirt, and later in an {event-only photobook} as promoted by her on Twitter
[2]Married to fellow voice actor Kaji Yuki
[3]She is one of the first who grew quickly to 1 million Twitter followers as a voice actress in Japan

name: Tomatsu Haruka
intro: From Anime "Kannagi" as Nagi, idol group "sphere" and later in her countless roles in Anime
description: She is real perfect all around from looks to talent to her personality despite having a slender figure. Over the years, the roles she starred in Anime are diverse yet professionally voiced, giving me every opportunity to fall in love with her time and again as she takes on more main roles. I secretly want to switch my same year elder sister with her haha
comments: [1]Also referred to as "Haru-chan" by other members in idol group "sphere"
[2]Under music label and talent agency MusicRay'n since 2008, notable for her theme songs for Anime series "Sword Art Online"; latest release November 2019
[3]Probably highest amount of appearances in photobooks half-naked among all the voice actresses mentioned here, to the extent of underwear even

name: Toyosaki Aki
intro: From Anime "K-ON!" as Hirasawa Yui and "Hatsukoi Limited." as Bessho Koyoi
description: You'll know her when she appears in Anime[2] (arguably over Hanazawa Kana), and I have loved her everything[3] for the duration of her solo music career before she was married. Today her is still my definition of cute, being jovial and lovely as a veteran in the industry with many roles under her belt.
comments: [1]Under music label and talent agency MusicRay'n since 2009
[2]The first exception to this was from Anime "Fractale" when she voiced a matured woman and was totally different from her usual voice. It threw me off the wall and beyond but I liked it too
[3]As in the 14/15 singles and 4/4 albums on my shelf from 2009 to 2017. Don't mind her height though, being tall wasn't her choice; Although I would argue I am too so we are a perfect fit hehe

name: Yuuki Aoi
intro: From Anime "A Channel" as Tooru and with Taketatsu Ayana in idol unit "petit milady"
description: Being a master and child prodigy in voice acting[2], she voices a myriad of roles from where you will least expect her[3], and her age is totally not reflective of her easy-going personality and cute appearance. My love for her grew slowly but surely over the years and today she deserves my utmost respect of producing her own animated series "YUKI×AOI Chimera Project".
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "Ao-chan", though I would like to call her -sensei at this point
[2]She was main in the original AND remake of Anime "Kino no Tabi", premiered on 2003.04.08 and 2017.10.06 respectively

[3]Her voice acting ranged from voicing Otus Lotta in Anime "ACCA" (cute) to Hanatabake Yoshiko in "Aho Girl" (crazy) to Takagi Megumi in "Sangatsu no Lion" (cool) all casted within the same year, in 2017

name: Amamiya Sora
intro: From Anime "Isshukan Friends." as Fujimiya Kaori
description: She's that same year wife I want but cannot get, to be frank. She is well-mannered and rather serious in front of the camera, but she is cute, sometimes emotional and even sadistic within it makes her fellow group members from TrySail scared. If you feel that you are in a different level with her, you are not alone.
comments: [1]Because her name can be pronounced as "Sora" and "{Ten}" in Japanese
[2]Under music label and talent agency MusicRay'n since 2014
[3]I doubt we'll ever see it to be honest, as much as I would love to. But I'll take as many shots this attractive woman can come up with as I can, for example {this photobook which I reviewed}

name: Asakura Momo
intro: From her idol group "TrySail" and later in Anime "WWW.WORKING!!" as Yanagiba Miri and "PriPri Chii-chan" as Yuuka
description: I just want her as a friend who will light up my life, make me a genius (because sometimes she isn't[3]), and I want to cuddle her every day after work just because I think serious her needs some too. Life-sized bolsters have nothing on this girl. Inside of Anime her voice does stand out, sadly underrated thanks to the crowded voice acting industry.
comments: [1]Under music label and talent agency MusicRay'n since 2016
[2]I'll call {her 1st photobook} technically it even though it's under a thin shirt

[3]YouTube has clips about how she flubs on livestreams and sometimes can't control her own desires for food even in front of the camera, and how she screws up things when she is live with her fellow idol unit TrySail members

name: Endou Yurika
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Mizushima Airi
description: She has a fashion style one would be proud of dating, and she has a lovely personality and voice. Even though I've only heard her from that one mobile game, but what else is not to like about her?
comments: [1]Retired as of 2018 due to health reasons; Passed on her active roles to others eg. Mizushima Airi to Waki Azumi, Anime series "BanG Dream!" born music group "Roselia" was also restructured due to her departure
[2]Under music label PONY CANYON, from 2014 to 2018

name: Hidaka Rina
intro: Because she looks cute and sounds like it too, and later from Anime "Servant x Service" as Momoi Kanon
description: She's the cute girl type that everyone loves, but I just think she looks cute even after all these years I've known her. Later on I also found out she has a lovely personality too[3] so that's a plus. Our paths hardly cross in Anime even if she has been around way longer than many mentioned here.
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "ChanRina" for some reason I don't know, but it is associated to how fellow seiyuu called her as such
[2]She has however appeared in gravure magazines twice, making you wonder where on Earth is that photobook drop
[3]As seen from Internet video series "Ohisamagumi" with Hikasa Youko

name: Kouno Marika
intro: From Anime "Sore ga Seiyuu!" as Kohara Rin and later in Game "Alternative Girls" as Onitsuka Chiho
description: Initially it was due to seeing her grow over the years since her first starring role in Anime, and thanks to my friend who got interested in her, I've grown more interested in her than ever before probably over my friend at this point. Her sexy levels may be too much to handle[3] even with her cute personality.
comments: [1]Member of idol unit "Earphones" born from Anime "Sore ga Seiyuu!"; Solo music career under music label Nippon Columbia; I also reviewed {her debut single}
[2]She technically did not appear half-naked in {her 1st photobook} despite the bath dip, as mentioned in the interview
[3]Try her Instagram account (retired in view of fanclub activity started June 2021) and you'll realize how one can be sexy without being half-naked

name: Minase Inori
intro: From Anime "Sora no Method" as Noel, and later from her solo 2nd single[3] and Anime "Tsurezure Children" as Takano Chizuru
description: Her singing voice has been impeccable ever since I gave her solo music career a chance, she is popular amongst production and fans, she is the definition of cute to many, and she has a very real yet loving personality in front of the camera. It's hard not to like her. Inside of Anime, I'll be smiling every time she voices characters who are as cute as her.
comments: [1]Under music label KING AMUSEMENT CREATIVE, since 2015
[2]She has till date, mind you, never released a full photobook of any sort in her career thus far which is a rarity since many will have done so from a magazine serialisation and she has one.
[3]{Music video of "harmony ribbon"} is on YouTube

name: Natsukawa Shiina
intro: Probably from Anime "Sora no Method" as Komiya Nonoka, and then from idol group TrySail and Anime "Demi-chan wa Kataritai" as Kusakabe Yuki
description: From her lovely voice to that adorable face to that fantastic cry when she sings... She is the perfect video game-loving younger sister I have always wanted. Period. A Japanese voice actress who plays video games on YouTube[3]? What more can I ask? She may not have many roles in Anime that I know but her image to be still shines through the light.
comments: [1]She is more commonly called "Nansu", and her name Shi-i-na coincides with the number "417"
[2]She is more literary than we think, with {her 1st photobook} which I reviewed eventually getting its own novel serialization written by yours truly

[3]Initially she was in gaming site Famitsu on a monthly column, and now she does YouTube gameplays on their official channel with games from Resident Evil to that {Harvest Moon remake} which I bought the Japanese version and played because of her instead of waiting for the English version to come out half a year later

name: Numakura Manami
intro: From Anime "Dagashi Kashi" as Endou Saya, and later from her solo music career[1]
description: Her voice acting in a variety of roles over the years fascinated me, I couldn't forget about her. Add in her powerful singing voice and she is formidable. Her personality on camera is lovely too, probably more memorable than I could imagine.
comments: [1]Under music label "Flying Dog" from 2016 to 2020; Her 2nd single "{Climber's High}" for Anime "Fuuka" is her most impressive release in Klassic Note
[2]Married to fellow voice actor Osaka Ryouta with one child

name: Tachibana Rika
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Meya and its official livestream series "OruKomi" as a regular
description: Her bubbly personality in front of the camera is a rarity even with her late entry to the industry, and she has been lovely all around ever since. Anime roles not included in this judgement since we hardly cross paths anyway.
comments: [1]Under music label Rokkan Music (under Teichiku Entertainment), from 2018 to 2020
[2]She did release two books worth of photos without her half-naked and that kind of explains her age in my opinion

name: Takahashi Rie
intro: From Anime "Sore ga Seiyuu!" as Ichinose Futaba, and later in "Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san" as Takagi
description: Her jovial personality outside of Anime makes me smile, and with her appearances in Anime live events and in her own cooking livestream[2] makes her a popular girl all around. Naturally, I'm drawn to her appealing character.
comments: [1]Part of idol unit "Earphones" born from Anime "Sore ga Seiyuu!"; Solo music career under music label A-Sketch since June 2021

[2]She hosts her own livestream series sponsored by an online cooking website Cookpad where she makes her own dishes, as much as she isn't good at it initially. Today this might just be one of her known hobbies as seen from her Tweets.

name: Touyama Nao
intro: From Anime "KONOBI" as Imari Maria, and later from her 2nd solo single[1]
description: She is so cute, appearance and all, after getting into her singing and voice acting I've never said no to her cuteness[3] ever since. Inside of Anime, she has a rather distinctive cute voice that is easy to recognize, regardless of her role.
comments: [1]Under music label "Flying Dog" since 2017; {Music video preview} on YouTube, for Anime "Tsuki ga Kirei"
[2]She may be too cute to have such a photobook, or even have one...? Unless you want to regard that {voice acting 10th anniversary photobook} as one

[3]The only exception is Anime "Kiniro Mosiac" because I'm afraid I might die of her cuteness with her voicing as English foreigner Karen. And I would argue her speaking English isn't as awesome as we think even if she learnt from her dad as a kid.

name: Uesaka Sumire
intro: From Anime "KONOBI" as Colette and Game "Alternative Girls" as Hiiragi Tsumugi
description: Her obvious rack drew me in, and everything from her cute voice acting[3] to her somewhat weak singing in her solo music career (to her love for Russia maybe) to her rather clumsy yet wild personality, were just part of her fan package. The ridiculously high amount of images she posts weekly on the Internet are my daily fuel.
comments: [1]Under music label KING AMUSEMENT CREATIVE since 2013
[2]Refer to {her photobook from 2019} which I reviewed for shots that will blow your mind
[3]I prefer when she uses her own voice or her being matured, such as from Anime "Aho Girl" as Morals Council Chairperson

name: Anzai Chika
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Tendou Machi, and later in Anime "Araburu Kisetsu no Otome Domo yo." as Sugawara Niina
description: She may look normal in every aspect, but from her matured look to her jovial personality she brings about a very friendly aura and will totally make of a lovely drinking partner provided if you can pay for her drinks. I don't know enough about her to be honest.
comments: [1]More commonly known as "Chikape"
[2]{She released a photobook} for her 10th year as a voice actress, and I reviewed it. Do wet shirts count?

name: Fuchigami Mai
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Sylvia Richter and later from Anime "Assassination Classroom" as Shiota Nagisa
description: She is known for acting male characters, but it's when she voices females that shows out her best, in my opinion. Not talking about voice, she doesn't look half bad either. Her singing career[2] is really helping to improve her feminine image on me.
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "MaiMai"
[2]Under music label Lantis; Most notably in Klassic Note is "{BLACK CAT}" where in the music video she dressed up as a cat girl

name: Hondo Kaede
intro: From Anime "Demi-chan wa Kataritai" as Takanashi Hikari, and later in Game "Alternative Girls" as Kira Sayuri
description: She is in the level of adorable that everyone will love in Anime, making her super popular around 2017 that somewhat died down. Outside of Anime, she has an active personality and shows enthusiasm in her job[3], compensating for her (slight) imperfections in image.
comments: [1]Pronounced as "A-dey-chan", a short form of her name Ka-e-de
[2]She has released {her 1st photobook} stating that it did not involve her voice acting skills, and had a hair length change to relate to her hometown

[3]A common example of that was when she dressed up to the extent of even making custom merchandise for the characters she voices, as seen from "Demi-chan" event where she shows up as casual look Hikari and in "Alternative Girls" livestream series where she shows up in the T-shirt worn by her character that has never been mass produced as official goods

name: Isobe Karin
intro: From Anime "Just Because!" as Natsume Mio and later in Game "IDOLMASTER: Shiny Colors" as Tsukioka Kogane
description: Once you realise who she is behind Anime and know how lovely she is beyond everything else, you will not stop liking her, just like I did. She just needs more Anime roles though, been working on games and that idol unit may not be enough exposure.
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "Karirin" but "Karin-chan" is also popular
[2]Part of five-member idol group BlooDye and four-member idol group Healer Girls
[3]I have reviewed her 1st photobook with swimsuits and even lingerie to please, we don't deserve this much from her in my opinion

name: Kido Ibuki
intro: From Anime "Subete ga F ni Naru" as Magata Shiki and Game "Alternative Girls" as Saionji Rei and Anime "Eromanga-sensei" as Megumi
description: Her tsundere voices are my fuel, and she is kind of cute. Despite her young age in the industry she excels in her roles and has a somewhat sloppy character and I like her for that somehow.
comments: [1]People like to call her "Ibuking" I don't know. That's how she came up with her Twitter account name, I guess.
[2]Part of idol group "everying!" with Yamasaki Erii
[3]I reviewed {her 1st photobook} without swimsuits which got a remaster the following year

name: Kitou Akari
intro: From Anime "Blend.S" as Hinata Kaho and Anime "Tsurezure Children" as Ijima Kana
description: Her voice acting might be overrated by me considering she's still rather new, but so far her embarrassment drew me in. Somehow her fear of horror amongst many things about her gives me a vibe unlike her genius personality[3]. The singing just makes her perfect imouto candidate now lol
comments: [1]Under music label PONY CANYON; I reviewed {her debut single}
[2]She has released photobooks without swimsuits to please, like {her 1st photobook} which I reviewed; Her self-produced photobook was the first time she wore a swimsuit in her life according to her
[3]She was a part-time illustrator before she became a voice actor, and explained on TV on how easy it is to do it AND study in school

name: Koga Aoi
intro: From Anime "Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai" as Shinomiya Kaguya
description: She is that friend's friend who one will like over time, for her shy yet friendly personality makes her an adorable friend to hang out with. Coming from a poorer background, she is also thankful for her career as a voice actress today. In Anime, she has a slight corase voice one would recognize easily.
comments: [1]Referred to by Kohara Konomi as "Ao-chan", and I don't even know what to call her while not confusing her with Yuuki Aoi
[2]I reviewed {her 1st photobook} and I don't think I need swimsuits anymore since I got to date her

name: Kohara Konomi
intro: From Anime "Asobi Asobase" as Nomura Kasumi and earlier in Anime "Tsuki ga Kirei" as Mizuno Akane
description: She may have a temper, she may not be the cutest girl out there, but she is presenting herself as honest and as beautiful she can and I applaud her for that. Which also makes me like her that much more when she is in every cute role[2] of every other Anime.
comments: [1]I have reviewed {her more artistic feel photobook} without swimsuits though
[2]Most notable I've seen include Anime "Takagi-san" as Mina-chan and "Kaguya-sama" as Fujiwara Chika

name: Lynn
intro: From Anime "Demi-chan wa Kataritai" as Takanashi Himari and later in Anime "Just Because!" as Komiya Ena
description: Besides being uniquely Western in appearance (mix between American and Japanese), she is totally Japanese has a really nice voice that leaves an impression despite not being in the spotlight. Over the years I just happen to remember her name and how well she performs. Outside of Anime is where she totally shines, being a lot more jovial and easy-going than others[2].
comments: [1]If her very first photobook and Okinawa aren't your friends yet, you have to see my ogling on {her 1st photobook}
[2]See her {Resident Evil gameplay} on her talent company's official YouTube channel, where she dressed up as a teacher ready to "teach them zombies a lesson"

name: Nagae Rika
intro: From Anime "Asobi Asobase" as Olivia and "PriPri Chii-chan" as Joe-kun
description: She's that cute waifu we all want. She is entertaining in front of the camera[4], loves to talk to her fans and she loves cooking too, so that's a plus. Sadly she isn't that interested in guys(?) it seems so that's quite a bummer lol why
comments: [1]According to her pinned Instagram stories, the nickname exists in Hiragana and Katakana forms, and they represent intimate and casual forms respectively. Fans usually refer to her Katakana nickname.
[2]As leaked by a news article which quickly removed the birth year, surprisingly younger than I thought
[3]I have though, done {a review of her 1st photobook} which has shots to please you don't need a swimsuit
[4]She has her own web series titled "Tensai!? Rikachimalu" where she tries out things eg. {hair arrangement} despite little to zero knowledge of them

name: Nagatsuma Juuri
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Agatsuma Ren
description: She has the best overall package to love, and in her first impression to me she voiced someone who is desperate to love. What else can I ask for? Outside of voice acting she has a friendly personality, though not much is known about her even after all these years. Her weekly blog post on Sundays is a good indicator of her recent activities.
comments: [1]Thanks to one Muscle Miyazaki from Game "Alternative Girls" livestream series I can't forget this now lol
[2]Released two singles under retired music label ZERO-A, but you should have heard {her self-composed character song} in the only game I know of her

name: Omigawa Chiaki
intro: From Anime "Seitokai Yakuindomo" as Mitsuba Mutsumi, and later in Anime "Bungou Stray Dogs" as Tanizaki Naomi and "Chio-chan no Tsuugakuro" as Nonomura Manana
description: She may not have many roles over the past decade, but you'll recognise her coarse yet lovely voice from a mile away. Her personality outside of Anime is even better than her roles, and as she gets older her allure[2] presented from her Instagram photos attracted me to her more than ever.
comments: [1]Fans call her "Omichu", but I think she is too matured to have such nicknames; She has a Chinese nickname read as "Xiao Qian Ji" as in "Little Chiaki Princess"
[2]I have reviewed a photobook(?) from Anime "Bungou Stray Dogs" original {novel-based recital event} and I think you'll understand her eroticism without me explaining it

name: Oonishi Saori
intro: From Game "Eromanga-sensei" as Senjuu Muramasa, and later in Game "Dead or Alive: Venus Vacation" as Tamaki
description: This is another one of those "your friend's hotter than you" and being on the same video series as Minase Inori[2] it's not hard to notice a difference. Oonishi exudes a playful yet matured personality, making her an absolute talent outside of Anime[3]. Inside of Anime, it's when she potrays matured characters (see above roles) that makes her stand out.
comments: [1]I typically refer to her by her family name, but more commonly referred to as "Saorin"
[2]From live video series off Anime "Re:Zero" with Minase Inori "Minase Inori to Oonishi Saori no Pick Up Girls!" where they just hang around to chat in 10-minute videos
[3]Through several YouTube videos featuring her and Sakura Ayane's radio show where they just flirt around and win the Anime Radio Awards while they're at it

name: Oono Yuuko
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Beruru
description: Her roles do stand out to be very different from her in person, because this inherent cuteness flowing out within her is hard to resist. If she ever out-cutes her own voice in an Anime role I think I'll die of overdose. She is a really good definition of what kawaii is in Japan without even acting. In Anime, she has been given opportunities to perform even cool characters[1].
comments: [1]She was the main character for Anime "Mahou Shoujo Site"

name: Oozora Naomi
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Tachibana Naomi and later in Anime "Chio-chan no Tsuugakuro" as Miyamo Chio
description: Despite her age and late entrance into the Anime industry, she excels cutely in roles involving her Osaka hometown accent[2]. Outside Anime she presents a lively personality and subtle awkwardness that is to love.
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "SoraSora"
[2]Examples I know include mobile game "Alternative Girls", and as Kanna in desktop video game "Dead or Alive: Venus Vacation"

name: Toyota Moe
intro: From Itou Miku (not featured here) and their idol unit Pyxis
description: She's like that friend's friend who is more attractive than your friend lol (sorry Itou Miku no offense). She is not as popular in roles though as she is somewhat new, but her roles do present her as being idol-like, and not that I've given any though. Without much Anime credit I am refraining my idolism on her tbh but she is irresistably cute[3].
comments: [1]Part of idol unit "Pyxis" with fellow voice actress Itou Miku; Solo debut album released in 2023 for her 10th year of being a voice actress where she sings cover songs and originals
[2]I reviewed all her solo and group photobooks with swimsuits- NO I DID NOT haha
[3]If you followed her Twitter and Instagram and don't think she's dating you, you need to try harder lol

name: Waki Azumi
intro: From Anime "Blend.S" as Sakuranomiya Maika, and later in Anime "Midara na Ao-chan wa Benkyou ga Dekinai" as Horie Ao
description: Her many appealing selfies is proof of how good she can take photos alone, and I can't help myself but follow her. In terms of voice hers is not exactly unique but it is good and she is seen in a variety of roles and she excels in all of them[3].
comments: [1]Under music label Nippon Columbia since 2020
[2]I have reviewed {her 1st photobook} without any swimsuits, such a pity
[3]She was chosen as a replacement voice in Game "Alternative Girls" as Mizushima Airi, taking over from retired voice actress Endou Yurika

name: Yoshimura Haruka
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Orimiya Yui, and later in Anime "Domestic na Kanojo" as Kashiwabara Momo
description: Her personality is lovely despite her really compelling voice acting using her higher pitched cute voice, so for me it's mostly how she expresses herself very amicably outside of Anime that makes her stand out.
comments: [1]Fans guess she's in her 30s before her marriage announcement, so maybe born in late 1980s- HOLY SHIT she is old haha
[2]She does post on her blog images of herself at the beach in a swimsuit, and I wouldn't even count that

name: Aizawa Saya
intro: From Anime "Taishou Otome Otogibanashi" as Tachibana Yuzuki, and later in Anime "Engage Kiss" as Kisara
description: She sounds like the girl next door we would otherwise miss, because her voicing cute characters (especially when I found out it was from a series years ago) has not been disappointing, and her somewhat straight-faced character in front of the camera[3] is rubbing off on me so why not.
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "Sacchan" or "Sa-yan"
[2]She does sing for Anime though, in an example {she covered a song} as an Anime character in "Engage Kiss"
[3]She hosts a {fortnightly livestream series} where she just has good food and drinks and replies to fan mails

name: Kanno Mai
intro: From the introductory livestream of Anime "IDOLY PRIDE" because she's cute
description: Initially it didn't even catch my attention, but as I see her on social media more often and thanks to her Instagram lives where she sings acapella karaoke[2], she only got more adorable in my impression.
comments: [1]Due to her associating vocabulary with her name? Fans do refer to her as "Kanma-chan" as an abbreviation to her name
[2]You can only catch this live she only archives those streams for at most 24 hours so I can't show you any examples :(

name: Tomita Miyu
intro: From Anime "Joshikousei no Mudazukai" as Yamamoto Minami and "Houkago Saikoro Club" as Oono Midori
description: Her roles in Anime have been impressive as I have seen a few till date, but outside of Anime she is a total millennia having a picky appetite, nonchalant in reactions[3], and is cool overall. It's hard to not be interested in her. Her boyish image is covering up her childish yet innocent personality.
comments: [1]From an Anime "JoshiMuda" livestream where veteran Okitsu Kazuyuki fanboys on her also promoting her as a then newbie and shouting "MIYU-CHAN!!"
[2]Under music label Columbia Japan since 2019; Debut single was for Anime "Houkago Saikoro Club"
[3]For example, in a YouTube video where fellow talent company member {Funato Yurie tries to prank her}, Miyu-chan has shown to not freak out under an electric shock pen and cockroaches

name: Tsuda Minami
intro: From Anime "Fractale" as Phryne, and later in Game "Dead or Alive Extreme: Venus Vacation" as Misaki
description: I think I've known her for too long, and my love for her has only grown every so little over the years, I stil think I'm into her than ever before, with her slightly coarse and adorable voice acting, it's always a joy to hear her. The lipstick selfies[2] are just fuel for desire to kiss her, by the way.
comments: [1]I regret never reviewing her only photobook because damn if you did not notice how stacked she was no one will
[2]Due to overwhelming response from fans, her Twitter account now posts so many selfies of her showing what lipstick she used to the extent one would easily misunderstand otherwise

name: Ueda Reina
intro: From "Majo no Tabitabi" as Doll Store Owner, or earlier from voice actress Takahashi Rie
description: Over the years I kept referring her to as "another Kana-chan" due to the similarity in voice but I feel like as I know her more she is very chill, surprisingly feminine, exhibiting a different type of aura that I would have thought, and I've grown to like that a lot more with her solo artist songs compared to her voice acting roles.
comments: [1]Under Lantis since 2016, but I've only known her since 2020 with a single B-side "{Hana no Ame}", and she only continues to impress with her 2021 album and 2022 mini-album
[2]She has released a photobook about artwork and her which you might expect featured less of her but more of famous works of art

category: ミュージックレイン3期生

name: Hinata Moka
